errors.error_description: The Python version requirement is ambiguously stated as 'python', which could lead users to attempt setup with an incompatible version like Python 2.
correction_candidates: You need python 3 or greater as well as pip:
You need python 3.6 or greater as well as pip:
You need the latest version of python as well as pip:
You need python version 3.6, 3.7, or 3.8 as well as pip:
errors.golden_answer: You need python 3.6 or greater as well as pip:

errors.error_description: The documentation specifies an incorrect default configuration file name `~/.op-test.conf`, which the application will not read automatically.
correction_candidates: The `~/.config/op-test.conf` file is always read, and you can specify another with `--config-file`.
The `/etc/op-test.conf` file is always read, and you can specify another with `--config-file`.
The `~/.op-test-framework.conf` file is always read, and you can specify another with `--config-file`.
The `op-test.conf` file in the current directory is always read, and you can specify another with `--config-file`.
errors.golden_answer: The `~/.op-test-framework.conf` file is always read, and you can specify another with `--config-file`.
